analysis.description:

	Dangerous comparisons:
	- DAY_IN_SECONDS + secondsAccountedFor > timestamp (/unique_chucks/13/0x2d17e56fb46cfebb9d07603588050afc2b6dfca9.sol#1690-1696)
	- HOUR_IN_SECONDS + secondsAccountedFor > timestamp (/unique_chucks/13/0x2d17e56fb46cfebb9d07603588050afc2b6dfca9.sol#1700-1705)

	- timestamp - secondsAccountedFor > 60 (/unique_chucks/13/0x2d17e56fb46cfebb9d07603588050afc2b6dfca9.sol#1715-1718)
	- secondsInMonth + secondsAccountedFor > timestamp (/unique_chucks/13/0x2d17e56fb46cfebb9d07603588050afc2b6dfca9.sol#1682-1686)
